short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetches and displays titles of youtube links on mouse-over. Never get rickrolled again!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays a custom "title text" with video titles when you mouse-over youtube links.

Designed to be very light-weight and unobtrusive.

Specifically, it catches hover events on <a> links, uses the youtube API to fetch the title (if not already cached), and displays it by creating a <div> positioned above the link with the title.
